name: Exam Sad But Ded Clone
description:
Game made to exam specification.

10 levels, 
3 Difficulties,
Easy (Despite it telling you, you have 1 life you have infinite)
Normal (3 lives + 3 extra per level)
Insane(3 lives only + bonus if you collect them)

You have limited moves each level, use them wisely and try to make it to the end.
Its possible to win. You just need to pull all your hair out and make a human sacrifice and play with infinite lives.
